summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 37th Street, from Union Bay Place to 42nd Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109478 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
